```{r}
source("./visual_fx.R")

con_ctc<- connect_to_db("cancel_the_contract")

df <- dbGetQuery(
  con_ctc,
  "SELECT race AS label, rate 
   FROM av_managers_by_race")

races <- c("AIAN", "Latinx", "Black", "Other", "Total", "Multiracial", "SSWANA", "White", "NHPI", "Asian")

df_subset <- df %>%
  race_recode(.) %>%
  filter(label %in% races)

indicator <- "Manager employment"
title_text <- "AV residents who are Black, Latinx, or AIAN are least likely to be employed as managers"

single_bar_tot(df_subset, indicator, title_text)

dbDisconnect(con_ctc)
```
